text: Tower Hobbies was started in 1971 by Bruce Holecek, a hobbies enthusiast. Tower Hobbies is now a division of Horizon Hobby, LLC, which is headquartered in Champaign, Illinois, United States. ==References== ==External links== * Official Site Category:Champaign, Illinois Category:Companies based in Champaign County, Illinois
title: Tower Hobbies
